name: Masters Society
description:
This is the Masters Society, a group of adventurers. And for the first time in a long while, they're getting together for a small adventure. You follow Pauline, as you and your party travel through a forest, cave, and mountains to reach their destination.

Though this story isn't really about the whole group, and not really the adventure itself, but instead on three people, and their hopes for a complete family.

Made for the 2018 Extra Credits Game Jam!
